name: Garlicky Red Chili Hot Sauce
keywords: chili pepper, red bell pepper, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 hot red or orange chili peppers, such as habañero
2 red bell peppers ( 3/4 pound), roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Wearing rubber or latex gloves, roughly chop the chilies. Combine all ingredients in a small pot over medium-high heat. Once mixture is simmering, reduce heat to low, cover and continue to simmer until peppers are tender, 7 to 10 minutes. Do not inhale vapors; they will sting.

Transfer mixture to a blender and purée. Pour into a medium jar and allow to cool uncovered. Cover tightly and refrigerate for three days. Keep stored in refrigerator; sauce will last for several weeks or months.
